mean_cn: n. 检查站，关卡，记录点
mean_en: a place where people, cars, etc., are searched by someone (such as a police officer) before being allowed to continue
short_phrase: be checked at the airport checkpoint
sentence: No knives or poisons are allowed past this security checkpoint!
sentence_trans: 刀具和毒药都不允许通过安检口。
